LISTS_DESCRIPTION: List blocks for performing list operations.
LOGIC_DESCRIPTION: Logic control blocks for making decisions and comparisons.
MATH_DESCRIPTION: Math blocks for performing calculations and operations.
FUNCTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Procedure blocks for defining and calling functions.
VARIABLES_DESCRIPTION: Variable blocks for creating and managing variables.
LOGIC_TO_BOOLEAN_TOOLTIP: Convert a value to a Boolean.
MATH_TO_NUMBER_TOOLTIP: Convert a value to a Number.
MATH_TO_INTEGER_TOOLTIP: Convert a value to an Integer.
TEXT_TO_STRING_TOOLTIP: Convert a value to a String.
MATH_MAP_VALUE_TOOLTIP: Map a value from one range to another.
